snippet: A retrospective selection of photographs by Robert Adams is on exhibition at the Yale University Art Gallery in New Haven through Oct. 28.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews photographs by Robert Adams at the Yale University Art Gallery in New Haven (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: A retrospective selection of photographs by Robert Adams is on exhibition at the Yale University Art Gallery in New Haven through Oct. 28.

headline.seo: A Review of ‘Robert Adams: The Place We Live,’ in New Haven
headline.main: An Unblinking Eye on the New West
headline.print_headline: An Unblinking Eye On the New West
